title: Exhibition Learning Effectiveness Improvement Program Using Digital Learning Sheets

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of exhibition learning or digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Operated in a smartphone-based learning environment with project-based assessment methods.

learning_goals: Learners improve learning motivation by over 20% using digital learning sheets linked to exhibition content.
Learners analyze case studies applying the "sensory exploration principle" in digital learning sheets and implement them in real projects.
Learners develop self-assessment tools to measure cognitive and psychomotor learning outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
